tool.name: Cell types - combine tools outputs
tool.description: Combine predictions for single tool from multiple datasets
tool.command:
mkdir -p input_dir; #for $table in $input_tables: cp '$table' input_dir/; #end for
combine_tool_outputs.R --input-dir input_dir --top-labels-num "${top_labels_num}" --scores "${scores}" --output-table "${output_table}"
#if $exclusions --exclusions "${exclusions}" #end if

param.name: input_tables
param.label: Tables with predicted labels
param.help: Standardised tables obtained from multiple classifiers

param.name: top_labels_num
param.label: Number of top labels
param.help: Number of top labels to select

param.name: exclusions
param.label: Exclusions file
param.help: Yaml file with trivial terms and unlabelled cells

param.name: scores
param.label: scores
param.help: Are scores included into the tool outpus?
